data.name: Gintama: A Phoenix Rises from the Ashes Over and Over
data.short_description: Has Madao finally found a job?! For some reason, he's become the friendly scary-story teller at the park and comes to Odd Jobs to collect some more scary stories.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
